attributes.action: TO STOP TREATING THE BRITISH PEOPLE  LIKE SECOND CLASS CITIZENS IN OUR OWN COUNTRY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What other country could you walk into and be given free healthcare, free housing and free cash without paying bugger all into the country in the first place,you try going to another country and asking for free healthcare, housing or benefits and see what happens, Yet after paying into the NHS all my working life my GP has just told me that it will cost me NINETY FOUR POUND & FIFTY PENCE for a medical which i need to keep my psv licence, I bet if i had just walked into this country i could have got it for nothing, talk about SECOND CLASS CITIZENS in your own country,We keep hearing about the average person  being on TWENTY FIVE THOUSAND POUNDS A YEAR, I would like to meet all these so called average people. Most people i know earn around FIFTEEN THOUSAND POUNDS A YEAR,maybe thats because i live in the REAL world and NOT the FANTASY land of the goverment

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
